overview: Two days after his triumphant Glastonbury performance, David Bowie returned to London on 27th June 2000, for an exclusive show at the BBC Radio Theatre in front of a select number of fans.  The tracks chosen from his wide-ranging set for this broadcast were: Wild Is The Wind, Ashes To Ashes, This Is Not America, Absolute Beginners, Little Wonder, The Man Who Sold The World, Fame, Stay, Hallo Spaceboy, Cracked Actor, Iâ€™m Afraid Of Americans.
title: Bowie at the BBC
